Well there should be assertions for situations like this, I agree 
with thi=
s statement. Delta coding allows only the 2 of the top 
species to reproduc=
e, but if it is only one species, this could bring 
a problem.. But for a s=
ituation where there is only one species, the 
compatibility treshold shoul=
d be lowered so that more species can 
appear...
